availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Muhlenberg County, Kentucky, farmer. Tennessee native. Married Cynthia Ann Jenkins Skipworth in 1854. Father of Willis T. F. Skipworth, William T. H. C. Skipworth, and Julia A. L. Skipworth. Farmer in Muhlenberg County in 1850 and 1860.

bibl.p: Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Muhlenberg County, District 1, p. 218; Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Muhlenberg County, District 2, p. 18; Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Muhlenberg County, Court House Precinct 3, p. 4; Yates Publishing, U.S. and International Marriage Records, 1560-1900, Ancestry, source no. 2493.000, Tennessee, 1854; Find A Grave, "Ira Calloway Skipworth (1826-1906)," Memorial #92439692, http://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GSln=Skipworth&GSiman=1&GScid=1962539&GRid=92439692& (accessed May 29, 2017).
